DOC.detailed_description: SPECIFIC AIMS AND OBJECTIVES The specific aim registry protocol : - To create maintain secure online database patient JIA - To collect data element related cost care patient JIA - Compare standard outcome disease activity measure health care expenditures JIA - To determine method reduce cost improve outcome quality care The study plan enroll 300 subject 3 medical center US 24 month period . Subjects study patient Juvenile Idiopathic Arthritis . Enrollment protocol include key demographic clinical data include , medication exposure , disease severity , function include disease-specific data element ; estimate health care service utilization health care expenditures . Data collect per subject within context standard care visit .
